OOC: You mean my guy?

BIC: Gun Man hears the call from his Warhead. (Hey, =
all the good names have been taken)

Gun Man: I don't remember them calling=
 me before.

He starts walking slowly towards the location he was called to=
. He was taking his time, not figuring that the Quasacons would mind his ta=
rdiness...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: warriorazure 
  To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, February 17, 2002 9:02 AM
  Subject: Q=
uasacons & Sadisticons/attn Narrator


  The transmission arrives to the sp=
ace station about 12 hours after it 
  was sent. Its message booms in all o=
f it so loud that every sleeping 
  bot will be awakened. As Warhead hears =
it, he is filled with joy. 
  Combat! After a year of drilling his team, th=
ey will finally get 
  combat!

  Warhead: HEAR THAT QUASACONS! WE WILL HAV=
E OUR TIME FOR BATTLE! WE 
  SHALL FIGHT AND SLAUGHTER! Soon, we will depar=
t for Earth and join the 
  Sadisticons. (He moves to the console near him)=
 As soon as this 
  slacker gets here... (He activates the speakers) WILL T=
HE LAST 
  QUASACON, AND I MEAN YOU, GET UP TO THE BRIDGE RIGHT AWAY?!?! 

=
  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
  > Ultra=
Byte starts his speech, "As you all know now, we are heading 
  for 
  > Ea=
rth, when we land we will attack.  We do not know what factions 
  > yet.  =
But we will and I mean Will attack."
  > 
  >    As UltraByte says these wo=
rds the finally enter Earths 
  > Atmosphere.  Lobstruck, Lady Right, Lepor=
d, Kan Kick, and Snake Eyes 
  > all listen attenitivly.  Lepord was gettin=
g a little impatiant.
  > 
  >    'I thought this speech would be all excit=
ing and a box of 
  > Cybertron Gravy.'  Lepord thought.
  > 
  >    "We wi=
ll land then blow up the engine."  UltraByte says.
  > 
  >    With those w=
ords Lobstruck and Lady Right look up quickly in 
  > surprise.  "What!"
  =
> 
  >    "I know you are all thinking I must be crazy but I know all of 
 =
 you 
  > can defeat these bots.  We do not need to use the ship to blast 
=
  them, 
  > we can do it ourselves."  UltraByte says as he slams his fist =
down 
  on 
  > his chair.  That reminded UltraByte of the smudge earlier. =
 "By the 
  > way, Lady Right, next time you clean my chair don't miss a sp=
ot." 
  > 
  > 
  > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...=
> wrote:
  > > Lepord, Lobstruck, and Lady Right all enter the bridge(Hopef=
ully 
  > > followed by Void).  "Okay UltraByte the Intruder is taken care =

  > of."  
  > > Lobstruck says as he walks over to infront of the Big Cha=
ir of the 
  > > bridge.  Lepord and Lady Right start to have a side conver=
sation.
  > > 
  > > "I fought good,"  said Lepord to Lady Right quiet enou=
gh that you 
  > > could only hear it if you walk by.
  > > 
  > > "Yeah, I=
 am happy for you."  Lady Right says back.
  > > 
  > > OOC:  Umm I cant re=
member if any of the people joining my faction 
  > > have characters on th=
e ship or are join later but I shall give 
  them 
  > > time to respond an=
d if they have to tell me something do so over 
  > > private mail.

Void nods silently before heading to the bridge.
